attractions.name: Riverside Valley Nature Center
attractions.description: Explore over 200 acres of pristine wilderness with guided tours, educational programs, and wildlife observation areas. Perfect for families and nature enthusiasts.

attractions.name: Historic Riverside Mill
attractions.description: A beautifully preserved 19th-century grist mill showcasing our community's rich agricultural heritage. Features interactive exhibits and artisan demonstrations.

attractions.name: Valley View Golf Course
attractions.address: 321 Golf Club Drive, Riverside Valley, RV 12345
attractions.description: Championship 18-hole golf course with stunning mountain views. Includes pro shop, restaurant, and event facilities. Open to public with member privileges available.

attractions.name: Riverside Farmers Market
attractions.address: Downtown Square, 100 Main Street, Riverside Valley, RV 12345
attractions.description: Weekly farmers market featuring local produce, artisan crafts, and live music. Open Saturdays 8 AM - 2 PM, supporting over 50 local vendors.

attractions.name: Adventure Sports Complex
attractions.address: 567 Sports Center Boulevard, Riverside Valley, RV 12345
attractions.description: State-of-the-art facility offering rock climbing, kayak rentals, hiking trails, and seasonal skiing. Equipment rentals and professional instruction available.

attractions.name: Valley Arts & Culture Center
attractions.description: Community hub for visual and performing arts featuring rotating exhibitions, theater performances, art classes, and cultural events throughout the year.

attractions.name: Riverside Valley Observatory
attractions.description: Public observatory with powerful telescopes and planetarium shows. Monthly stargazing events and astronomy education programs for all ages.

attractions.name: Heritage Walking Trail
attractions.address: Historic District, Central Riverside Valley, RV 12345
attractions.description: Self-guided 2-mile walking tour through historic downtown featuring 15 landmark buildings with QR code information stations and beautiful river views.
